title: MKHthemes
text: ggplot2 awesome! However, defaults … undesirable ugly. MKHthemes provides ways improve ggplot2 graphs. default, MKHthemes provides pleasing graphs ggplot2, includes options tweak graphs easily. package contains one function, xy_theme(). default, xy_theme() looks great. Arguments provide easy ways adjust commonly needed esoteric settings hidden deep within ggplot2. vignette describes function xy_theme() arguments.

title: MKHthemes
text: default settings ggplot2 give following graph.  find figure quite ugly: Gray background? Really? Graphs made least amount ink. (See Edward Tufte.) much ink spilt background. Dark gray background facet labels? , much ink allocated non-data elements. Tick marks outside plot? elements graph point toward data, away . Tick marks outside point away data. Tick marks inside point toward data preferred. Grid lines? put viewer jail. improve appearance graph, use xy_theme().  default, xy_theme() eliminates background colour reduce amount ink plot, adds inward-pointing tick marks point toward data, provides thin gray border around graphs frame data, sets gray text border elements push visual background, enables easy fine-tuning many esoteric settings unlikely event disagree .
code: p <- df |>    ggplot2::ggplot(mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = x, y = y, colour = Country)) +    ggplot2::geom_line() +    ggplot2::facet_grid(rows = ggplot2::vars(Country),                        cols = ggplot2::vars(EorX)) p p + MKHthemes::xy_theme()

title: MKHthemes
text: xy_theme() provides several arguments enable easy adjustments graphical parameters, shown following examples.
code: # Change font size. Default is 12 points. p + MKHthemes::xy_theme(font_size = 8) # Change font family. Default is "", a sans-serif font. p + MKHthemes::xy_theme(font_family = "Times New Roman") # Change size of all non-axis-title fonts. p + MKHthemes::xy_theme(font_size_scale = 0.4) # Adjust tick length in points. Default is -0.3*font_size. # Negative values are strongly recommended,  # because they point the ticks inward. p + MKHthemes::xy_theme(tick_length = -7) # Adjust spacing between axis values and the border in points.  # Defaults are 0.2*font_size. p + MKHthemes::xy_theme(x_axis_labels_spacing = -5,                         y_axis_labels_spacing = 20) # Change facet label distance from the graph in points.  # Defaults are 0.2*font_size. p + MKHthemes::xy_theme(col_facet_labels_spacing = -3,                         row_facet_labels_spacing = 20) # Change border and label colour. Default is "gray50". p + MKHthemes::xy_theme(border_and_label_colour = "red")

what: Set a pleasing theme for graphs. — xy_theme
title: Set a pleasing theme for graphs. — xy_theme
text: Provides pleasing graphical style ggplot2 includes gray axes, gray tic marks, inward-pointing tic marks, right-justified y-axis labels, grid lines, white background.

title: Set a pleasing theme for graphs. — xy_theme
code: xy_theme(   font_size = 12,   font_family = "",   font_size_scale = 0.8,   spacing_scale = 0.2,   x_axis_labels_spacing = spacing_scale * font_size,   y_axis_labels_spacing = spacing_scale * font_size,   col_facet_labels_spacing = spacing_scale * font_size,   row_facet_labels_spacing = spacing_scale * font_size,   tick_length = -1.5 * spacing_scale * font_size,   border_and_label_colour = "gray50" )

title: Set a pleasing theme for graphs. — xy_theme
text: font_size base font size points fonts graphical elements. font_size directly size x- y-axis titles. Default 12. font_family font family used graph. Default empty string (""), sans-serif font. font_size_scale default scale factor non-axis-title fonts. Default 0.8. Change parameter want change size non-axis-title text. spacing_scale default scale factor spacing text axes. Default 0.2. x_axis_labels_spacing distance x axis labels x axis points. Default spacing_scale*font_size, normally 2.4 points. y_axis_labels_spacing distance y axis labels y axis points. Default spacing_scale*font_size, normally 2.4 points. col_facet_labels_spacing distance x strip text (labels top faceted plot) top border individual graphs points. Default spacing_scale*font_size, normally 2.4 points, leave space descenders. row_facet_labels_spacing distance y strip text (labels right faceted plot) right border individual graphs points. Default spacing_scale*font_size, normally 2.4 points, leave space descenders. tick_length tick length points. Default -1.5*spacing_scale*font_size, normally -3.6 points, ticks slightly longer spacing text borders. Negative tick length indicates ticks placed inside graph, ticks belong! border_and_label_colour colour borders labels. Default "gray50".

title: Set a pleasing theme for graphs. — xy_theme
text: default, font size axis titles set font_size. font size text elements scaled relative font_size, default 80% smaller axis titles. Adjust font_size_scale 80% liking. Spacing graphical elements can specified precision using function. spacing_scale adjusts spacing relative font_size graphical elements. spacing axis labels strip labels nearby graph borders can also specified individually. See vignette examples.

title: Set a pleasing theme for graphs. — xy_theme
code: library(ggplot2) DF <- data.frame(x = seq(1, 10), y = seq(11,20)) p <- DF |>   ggplot(mapping = aes(x = x, y = y)) +   geom_line() p  p + MKHthemes::xy_theme()
